pages.text: Wiwaxia is a Cambrian animal of uncertain placement that looked like a tiny slug like animal with several pairs of spines on its back. It was bilaterally symmetrical and had an elliptical body.
$(l)Eats:$() Fish Food$(br)$(l)Breeds with:$() Fish Food$(br)$(l)Egg Type:$() Drops Egg$(br)$(l)Method of Obtaining:$() Bucket
